attributes.action: Scrap the Road Fund Licence and recover the revenue from fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By scrapping the Road Fund Licence and recovering the revenue by putting the cost on Petrol and Diesel it would create a fair system as anybody using a vehicle would have to pay.
There would be no method of not paying thus bringing into the net the large number of people who do not tax their vehicles.
This scheme would ensure that those doing most mileage and using big vehicles would pay more.
No huge investment in new technology would be required thus saving billions of Pounds.
Above all this is a simple fair solution.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
